text: Find the incorrect statement from the following

options.a: Flower is a fascinating organ of angiosperms.
options.c: All flowers have both male and female sex organs
options.d: Flowers are morphological and embryological marvels

hint: Flowers may be bisexual or unisexual. Not all flowers have both sex organs; many are unisexual (e.g., cucurbits, papaya).
